Package src

Class SerializableShape

java.lang.Object
src.SerializableShape
public class SerializableShape extends Object
Represents a serializable version of a shape. This class is used for saving and loading shapes to/from JSON files.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SerializableShape(String type, double[] params, String outlineColor, String fillColor, boolean filled, int strokeWidth)
    Constructs a SerializableShape with the given attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • SerializableShape

      public SerializableShape(String type, double[] params, String outlineColor, String fillColor, boolean filled, int strokeWidth)
      Constructs a SerializableShape with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the shape (e.g., "CIRCLE", "RECTANGLE", "PATH").
      params - The parameters defining the shape (e.g., coordinates, dimensions).
      outlineColor - The outline color of the shape in hexadecimal format.
      fillColor - The fill color of the shape in hexadecimal format.
      filled - Whether the shape is filled (true) or only outlined (false).
      strokeWidth - The stroke width (outline thickness) of the shape.
